1.name: Assassin
1.flavourText:
Death is a banquet. 
 It's up to the murderer 
 to write the menu.

2.name: Trickster
2.flavourText:
Everyone knows how to die. 
 Some just need a little nudge 
to get them started.

3.name: Saboteur
3.flavourText:
The artist need not be present 
 to make a lasting impression.
